sn35.86:1.1: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.86:1.2: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.86:4.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.86:6.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.86:10.2: yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.86:12.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.86:14.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.86:18.3: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.86:20.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.86:22.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.86:24.1: “Evam passam, ananda, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe… cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.86:24.2: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.86:24.3: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.86:24.4: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
